Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Message.BuildMessages

Class ForcedDomeMessage

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Message.GameMessage
it.polimi.ingsw.Message.BuildMessages.BuildMessage
it.polimi.ingsw.Message.BuildMessages.ForcedDomeMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ForcedDomeMessage
extends BuildMessage
This message is created when a Dome is placed on the board forcefully.

  • Method Details

    • autoSetMessage

      public void autoSetMessage​(boolean isMyTurn, boolean isCLI)
      Description copied from class: GameMessage
      This method is used to generate automatically the correct message that will be shown to the player. This method will be call only on the Client, because requires information not known by the Server.
      Specified by:
      autoSetMessage in class GameMessage
      Parameters:
      isMyTurn - boolean telling if it's the player turn
      isCLI - boolean telling if the Client is a CLI one

    • updateGUI

      public void updateGUI​(PlaySpace playSpace)
      Description copied from class: GameMessage
      This method is used only by the GUI Client, and will used different method in the PlaySpace class to change the visual representation of the Game state
      Specified by:
      updateGUI in class GameMessage
      Parameters:
      playSpace - Client's PlaySpace that represents the Board and the current state of the Game
